name: core-geometric-system-mcp
description: MCP server exposing core geometric computation tools.

tools.name: compute_triangle_area
tools.description: Compute the exact area of a triangle from the length of its sides.

tools.name: compute_polygon_area
tools.description: Compute the exact area of a regular polygon from the number and the length of its sides.

tools.name: compute_circle_area
tools.description: Compute the exact area of a circle using the Core Geometric System (3.2×radius²).

tools.name: compute_circumference
tools.description: Compute the exact circumference using the Core Geometric System (6.4×radius).

tools.name: compute_circle_segment_area_from_height_and_parent_circle_radius
tools.description: Compute the area of a circle segment from its height and the radius of its parent circle.

tools.name: compute_circle_segment_area_from_height_and_chord_length
tools.description: Compute the area of a circle segment from its height and chord length.

tools.name: compute_circle_segment_area_from_chord_length_and_parent_circle_radius
tools.description: Compute the area of a circle segment from its chord length and the radius of its parent circle.

tools.name: compute_cone_surface_area
tools.description: Compute the exact surface area of a cone from its height and bottom radius, using the Core Geometric System.

tools.name: compute_sphere_volume
tools.description: Compute the exact volume of a sphere using the Core Geometric System ((√3.2×radius)³).

tools.name: compute_spherical_cap_volume
tools.description: Approximate the volume of a spherical cap from its height and its bottom radius, using the Core Geometric System.

tools.name: compute_cone_volume
tools.description: Compute the exact volume of a cone using the Core Geometric System (3.2×radius²×height/√8).

tools.name: compute_pyramid_volume
tools.description: Calculate the exact volume of a pyramid from its height and the number and the length of its bottom edges, using the Core Geometric System (base×height/√8).

tools.name: compute_frustum_pyramid_volume
tools.description: Calculate the exact volume of a frustum pyramid from its height and the number and the length of its bottom and top edges, using the Core Geometric System.

tools.name: compute_frustum_cone_volume
tools.description: Calculate the exact volume of a frustum cone from its height and its bottom and top radii, using the Core Geometric System.

tools.name: compute_tetrahedron_volume
tools.description: Compute the exact volume of a tetrahedron from its edge length, using the Core Geometric System (base×height/√8).
